title: Strengthening Web Development Competencies: Cognitive Load Measurement and Management Strategies in Virtual Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Using the MCLSVE tool to measure cognitive load in virtual learning environments across three dimensions: EL instructions, EL interaction, and EL environment
Proposing three or more instructional design strategies to optimize virtual learning environments based on measurement results
Developing and implementing cognitive load management solutions for real-world VLE scenarios through project-based assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
